name: Studio Legale Malaguti & Partners
goal:
Mission Statement
We are a commercial and transport law firm. All M&P professionals are educated, and have experience in, different areas of the law. However M&P professionals are experienced in maritime law, trucking law and transport law. We provides assistance to corporations of harbour pilots and tugs, ship agents, customs brokers and shipping companies giving advice on technical nautical services.
We also provide advice to different trucking companies associations with regard to Reg. (CE)
561/06, international transport, inert material transport, as well as to bus operators with the
preparation of tenders for local public transport.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Borders and Security, Business and Industry, Competition, Culture, Customs, Energy, Environment, External Relations, Foreign affairs and security policy, Humanitarian aid and civil protection, Institutional affairs, International co-operation and development, Maritime affairs and fisheries, Regional Policy, Single market, Trade, Trans-European Networks, Transport
